title: Nonogram Saga
description_short: Nonogram Saga is a puzzle game where you need to fill in the grid with the correct colors to solve the puzzle.
description: Nonogram Saga is a puzzle game where you need to fill in the grid with the correct colors to solve the puzzle.
description_full: Nonogram Saga is a puzzle game where you need to fill in the grid with the correct colors to solve the puzzle.
controls: Use arrow keys or WASD to move your spaceship. Press SPACE to shoot. Collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons and defeat the alien invaders.
